name: I Hate Orcs: In My Garden
summary: Jump, dodge, and speed your way around projectiles in this fast-paced game where your goal is to protect your garden by killing all the orcs!

name: I Have More Hours Than You
summary: I Have More Hours Than You is an Idle game with a loose abstract story about acceptance. But you'll probably just use it to brag about how many hours you have to your friends.

name: I Have Died
summary: You have died, and only you can discover how it happened. Do not worry though, I am here to help you. Let us figure this out together. This mixed media artistic point and click adventure novel will not take you long to complete.

name: I Hate Robots
summary: I Hate Robots is a fast-paced first-person action shooter. Play as a scientist battling robots on a mysterious planet. Explore dangerous portals, collect samples, and use an arsenal of weapons against dozens of enemy types. Atmospheric and intense levels await!

name: IHF Handball Challenge 12
summary:
IHF Handball Challenge 2012 is the handball action game sports fans have been waiting for many years. In this action-packed official IHF game, up to 5 players can experience the fascinating sport of handball and fight for national and international trophies. The best leagues of the world, the TOYOTA Handball-Bundesliga including 2nd league, the Spanish Liga ASOBAL and the IHF World Championship have been officially licensed.

IHF Handball Challenge 12 is presented by international Handballstars Nikola Karabatic (World Champion and Most valuable player 2011), Filip Jicha (World Handball Player 2010) und Dominik Klein (Winner Champions-League 2010)

IHF Handball Challenge 2012 offers 4 different game modes. Fans can replay the complete world championship 2011 in Sweden. All players have 11 different skills that have direct impact on the game.

Fast breaks, spectacular moves and pure emotions are some of the key elements that make handball the second most popular team sport in Europe. Handball Challenge combines successful features from well-known videogame franchises with highly innovative game play elements, thus creating a completely new sports game series.

name: I Have No Change
summary: “I Have No Change” is a first-person narrative game that immerses players in the atmosphere of a night kiosk filled with stories, melancholia, and the reflections of residents from Russia’s regions.

name: I Had a Friend
summary: In I Had a Friend, Richard returns to his family's house to care for the cat while his parents are away. What starts as a simple task turns unsettling as strange events unfold. With a dark atmosphere, the game focuses on exploration and the growing sense that something's not right.

name: I hope she's ok
summary:
“I hope she’s ok” is a single-player first-person atmospheric mystery inspired by Nordic folklore. Set around a beautiful lakeside cabin in the heart of Finland during the midsummer solstice, the idyllic scene takes a turn for the worse when you discover that your friend is missing.

Experience the mystery of midsummer in a traditional lakeside cabin in the heart of Finland, where the long evening gradually turns into dawn without ever visiting the night.

Every year you travel to this beautiful and remote part of the world to visit your oldest friend who lives an isolated life off the grid. Except this year for some reason and without warning, she’s not at home.

As you search for the clues that might help find your friend, things start taking a strange turn. Are you succumbing to cabin fever or could rumors of a mysterious lake creature actually explain her disappearance?

An avid social media user, you post regular photos and updates to your friends and followers. The tone you select for those interactions will go some way to determining whether you come through this experience unscathed.

name: I Hate Running Backwards
summary: I Hate Running Backwards is a fast paced infinite runner hybrid that puts the shoot 'em up genre on its head! Pick your character and blast away at enemies with a high powered weapons arsenal. Earn perks and get stronger as you defeat challenging bosses.

name: I Hate this Place
summary: I Hate This Place is an isometric open world survival horror set in an eerie, unpredictable world that's twisted beyond comprehension. Playing as Elena, you awaken forces that threaten to shatter everything you knew about reality.

name: I.H.A.S
summary: Experience story in this FPS Psychological game, shoot at futuristic robots or use your stealth skills to escape, explore and travel between different worlds using portals and find yourself

name: I, Hope
summary:
I, Hope is a beautiful coming of age adventure story about a young girl named Hope, whose town has been taken over by Cancer. The game is engaging for all, yet for survivors and children who are currently battling cancer, the game is empowering. The developer has truly set out to make a game that kids can play while receiving cancer treatments; something to distract them, but at the same time, put them back in control of their battle. In addition to this being a great game, the developer is donating all their proceeds from the game to Game Changer Charity, a wonderful non-profit organization whose mission is to spread hope and love to children staying in hospitals.

When we think of video games, our minds go to epic battles, fantasy worlds, crazy races and mind-boggling adventures. For Kenny Roy, creating a game is about hitting the perfect balance between pure amusement and lifting spirits.

name: I Hate My Legs
summary: A Foddian style game about Jeff, a turtle with human legs trying to find his father! The faster you move, the further you jump. Time your jump with your speed to make it to your father!

name: I Hate My Fingers
summary: Lose all you fingers... or don't

name: Ihatovo Monogatari
summary:
The story depicts the action as taking place in the utopian world of Ihatovo.

The game focuses on collecting information (notebooks from Miyazawa's fairy tales) and items (that are related to those fairy tales) instead of fighting monsters. Some of the surprises that the player finds includes a movie theater that is always closed, the opportunity to play the role of a temporary school teacher, and having portraits of unique non-player characters that show up while talking to them.

Inspired by the stories of Kenji Miyazawa, the story covers nine chapters and surreal environments.

name: I Have a Sect in the Mountains
summary: "I Have a Sect in the Mountains" is a cultivation-themed idle simulation game. Players can choose to become a construction enthusiast, a fashion expert, or even a grand master who trains disciples to conquer the world.

name: IHF Handball Challenge 14
summary:
Handball fans will finally be able to test themselves, gamepad in hand, thanks to the first simulation offering 20 national teams and 80 teams from the most prestigious leagues: The Ligue Nationale
de Handball (France), the Toyota Handball-Bundesliga (Germany), and the Liga Asobal (Spain).

You can also create your own players, make up a team, and participate in national leagues and international tournaments, or compete against up to 3 of your friends in a quick game.

name: I hate this game
summary: I hate this game is a logic game, where gameplay changes every level. Solve crazy puzzles and use forgotten functions of your PC! Be attentive, interact with everything that you see on the screen.

name: I Have an Item
summary: "I Have an Item" is a quick, chaotic multiplayer game for 2-4 players about risks, rewards, and item manipulations. Each turn, players blindly draw items from a shared dynamic pool, facing a constant dilemma. End the turn and keep resources or risk and draw more which can lead to triggering dangerous items sabotaging their turn or damaging them. This creates a tense, push-your-luck dynamic where greed is rewarded or punished instantly.

name: I Had a Plan!
summary: You are a Wizard, with a brilliant plan. Unfortunately you also have teammates. As you make your way through dungeons and forests alike, you need to manage your team mates… and your frustration. I Had A Plan! is a Tactical Roguelite Semi-Autobattler set in a 3D world with 2D Characters.

name: I Have Low Stats But My Class is "Leader", So I Recruited Everyone I Know to Fight the Dark Lord
summary: A comedy RPG where you play as 99 characters at once.

name: I Have No Mouth, and I Must Scream
summary:
I Have No Mouth, and I Must Scream is a point-and-click adventure game based upon Harlan Ellison's short story of the same title.
The game's story is set in a world where an evil computer named AM has destroyed all of humanity except for five people, whom he has been keeping alive and torturing for the past 109 years. Each survivor has a fatal flaw in their character, and in an attempt to crush their spirits, AM has constructed a metaphorical adventure for each that preys upon their weaknesses. To succeed in the game, the player must make choices to prove that humans are better than machines, because they have the ability to redeem themselves. Woven into the fabric of the story are ethical dilemmas dealing with issues such as insanity, rape, paranoia and genocide.

name: I hate it here
summary: Enter in military bases avoiding cameras

name: iHooy!
summary: iHooy! is an iPhone arcade smasher, controversial and packed with action. Got some high reviews on many sites. Got some low too.

name: I.H.N.I.
summary: I.H.N.I. is a 3 maps long mapset that's making some heavy use of GZDoom-specific features.

name: I Have Powers!
summary: This is a super heroic super hero arcade fighting game, make a Super hero using the classic 4 color costume design of comic-book Heroes. See how powerful you can make your character, see how long they can survive. Choose lots of different Super Powers, stop crime by any means!

name: IHRA Drag Racing 2004
summary: A game that tries to capture the thrill and excitement of drag racing.

name: I Hate Colors
summary:
I Hate Colors
The Pixel-blob hates all colors other than White.
Go on an endless mission to gobble all the colors that come in the way of the hungry angry Pixel-blob.
Its not easy to catch all of them, the mission gets tougher and puzzlingly awesome as you keep playing.
Enjoy a brain rattler anytime when you want a break.
Go Get It..!

name: I Have a Dream
summary: I HAVE A DREAM is a 3D puzzle line game. You wake up in a place you've never seen before. Adapt to the transformation of various points of view and get out of here!

name: IHugU
summary:
Hug them all! Don’t forget about anyone.
We wanted to see people of different cultures, religions, political options, beliefs, races, skin colour, historical figures, fairy-tale characters, celebrities and all living beings ;) pass to each other the sign of peace – a hug. In one place, in one game. We really believe that this is possible. I Hug U.

name: I Hurt Myself
summary:
A very short Bitsy game, built for the How Have You Been? Jam.
TW: Self-Harm, Mental Health, Swearing

name: I Have A Fear
summary:
Be my first tester of the project, I've been working on recently..

If you have some time on your hand, take a look at my works as you wonder through some of my games I made in the past.
This is my first time making something public, the levels you are about to see really needs some feedback. If you are ready, we can start right away..

name: I Hate Santa
summary:
It's a snowball fight in VR!
Shoot, dodge, and level up to defeat those crazy kids. Even battle fireworks and a monster house!
Finish this game you will find out Santa's dark secret.
An intense and entertaining journey for you and your family!

name: I Have No Nose and I Must Climb
summary: Work with your hands to help Wally reach the top of the world to retrieve something dear to them.

name: I Had Another Dream About You Last Night
summary: A short pixel adventure about dreams, crushes, and moving on.

name: I have lived
summary: Welcome to the end of an unnamed world. Its last wishes have materialized as two entities. Become a part of their journey and give the world another chance by recollecting the world's remaining Essences.

name: I Hate My Waifu Streamer
summary: Draw the attention of the streamer at any cost, before someone else does it. Write comments, chat, make donations to your waifu, but do not dare to hate her!

name: I H8 Ur Face
summary: Want to slap the sh*t out of someone but don't want to do time for it? Load an image of the poor bastard on to the dummy and release your rage!

name: I Heard There are Monsters Here
summary: "I Heard There Are Monsters Here" is a pixel , idle game. The monsters from the beast Land can never be killed forever. At the same time, the Land has countless minerals and wealth. Only when you have courage and wisdom at the same time, can you survive on the beast continent.

name: I Have No Weapons
summary: I Have No Weapons is a rogue-lite action indie game. It offers 36 interesting ways to kill enemies, by using enemy body parts as weapons...

name: I Heart Shift
summary: I Heart Shift is an Xbox Live Indie Game developed solely by Giant Bomb user Keir Miron (Fronominal).

name: I Hate (other) Animals!
summary: I Hate (other) Animals! is a reverse bullet hell game with roguelite elements with focus on exciting loot in a survivors-like setting. Collect loot during each run and buy permanent upgrades to your characters to make the next run a bit easier.

name: I Heart Geeks!
summary: I Heart Geeks! is the ultimate puzzle experience, challenging you to create sophisticated and humorous contraptions using dozens of objects and the laws of real-world physics to solve over 100 brain teasers. Produced in cooperation with Marc Ecko Entertainment, the game features a tongue-in-cheek story and hip art style where the brainy Geek overcomes the brawny (and bullying) Jocks, winning the heart of the beautiful Cheerleader.

name: I Hate You
summary: "I HATE YOU" is a ROM hack remake of a creepypaste by the same name.

name: I heard a dog barking
summary: A bitsy jam game about following a dog through a cave.

name: I Hate You, Please Suffer
summary: A woman becomes an adventurer and makes friends on a quest to pay rent - and maybe something much more. I Hate You, Please Suffer is an RPG set in a world where becoming an adventurer is a common career choice, where a woman tries to get by and find happiness regardless of how screwed up the world can be. Make money and find success in any way you can: from larger scale quests with loose continuity with each other and the surrounding world, to hunting down assorted weirdos for bounties, to catching fish.

name: I Have Hired This Anime Girl to Talk to You
summary: This visual novel is about you talking to a girl named Claire. That's all.

name: I Hope To See You Again
summary:
Memories of a goodbye.

I hope to see you again is a short immersive videoclip made as a contribution for the Zium Gallery.

name: I Had the Strangest Dream, Ivan
summary:
I Had The Strangest Dream, Ivan is a Yume Nikki fangame made for Dream Diary Jam 2. The game is primarily in English mixed with Russian dialogue; the Russian text was produced with Google Translate and is not meant for the player to actually be able to read it.

You play as Alexei, an ordinary man who's been unable to find work. He stays in an unfinished building and has befriended a resident there named Ivan. Alexei is unable to leave due to the rainfall, so he stays inside and dreams.

name: I Hurt Myself: Postjam Edition
summary: A short Bitsy game based on the original jam version from 2018. This version is greatly expanded, and is almost entirely a new game.

name: I Have One Day
summary: Finding yourself imprisoned, you have 1 day to solve your predicament, and save the kingdom from destruction, or suffer multiple game overs trying, in this point and click adventure game.

name: IHRA Motorsports Drag Racing
summary:
Endorsed by the International Hot Rod Association, IHRA Motorsports adds yet another dimension to the racing library on the PlayStation. Included are nine IHRA-sanctioned tracks as well as the top five racers from such IHRA classifications as Top Fuel, Pro Mod, Pro Stock, and Alcohol Funny Car. There are more than 50 vehicles in all ranging from the classics to the latest models. More than 70 vehicle settings can be adjusted too. 
 
Enjoy the power of Top Fuel, Pro Mod, Pro Stock, or Funny Car drag racing! Race on multiple tracks against some of the best drivers and cars of the IHRA. Start easy with a quick race, or modify any of the 70 different parts for optimum performance! Race on ten different tracks in different weather (day or night). Race friends or join tournaments online!

name: I Hate Heroes
summary: The first chapter in the VR Superhero platformer series I Hate Heroes! Play as a Rocket Man, a superhero trapped in the hell-prison of the greatest supervillain the world has ever known. Use your rocket thruster hands to zoom on the ground, grab massive air, avoid death, and collect keys to escape.

name: IHF Handball Challenge 13
summary: The follow-up to IHF Handball Challenge 12. It was quietly canceled so that work in IHF Handball Challenge 14 could begin.

name: IHRA Professional Drag Racing 2005
summary: Bethesda brings 50 vehicles, 24 pro drivers, and 11 sanctioned tracks to the 2005 edition of their drag racing franchise.

name: I Have Been There Twice
summary:
I have been there twice. Twice isn't enough, to be honest, but past the first time I have only been there in fragments, dreams and daydreams, and something half-assembled. The sum of an infinite series is finite, if each successive term diminishes. 1 + 1/2 + 1/4 + 1/8 + ... sums to two, no matter how many more times I see us walking through jioufen in the cool night, making our way back to the bus stop.

Created as part of of Ambient Mixtape 16: a collection of original curated works surrounding a central theme: "After Hours".

name: I Hit You
summary: Two players take on the roles of Hammer and Gopher. Gopher player: can summon a real or fake gopher by pressing the button corresponding to the cave. Hammer player: Attack by moving and clicking the left mouse button.

name: IHRA Drag Racing: Sportsman Edition
summary: IHRA Sportsman marks a new direction for the popular IHRA series, with its new racing rule set and gameplay completely redesigned from the ground up. IHRA Sportsman utilizes the Official IHRA Bracket Racing rule set of the Sportsman Series - featuring Top Sportsman and Top Dragster car classes. Designed to appeal to the casual racer along with the drag racing enthusiast, the game will offer a quick play Arcade mode along with a detailed simulation mode that allows you to experience the excitement and challenge of the IHRA Sportsman 12-event season. Players will earn money, buy and unlock new higher quality parts and cars as they progress towards the IHRA Sportsman Championship. You can fully customize 60 accurate and detailed vehicles in the garage and paint shop and race on 22 different tracks, including 11 official IHRA tracks and 11 original, fantasy-style tracks.

name: I Human Machine
summary: I Human machine:against machine or be one 2D Rougelike Pixel Action Game, for PC
